creator: la@saphor.de
text:
Parsing lenya.rng (in .../pubs/default/config/doctypes/schemas) with jing I get
the following error:


:41:54: error: reference to undefined pattern "Text.datatype"

And, indeed, this pattern seems to be undefined

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: can you provide a patch for lenya.rng?

lenya.rng does not validate stand-alone, but then again it is part of the xhtml
schema which validates fine (and has these patterns)
creator: gregor@apache.org
